p: Primary oxidation of oil used to monitor hydroperoxides formation is determined by PV and should be â‰¤5 meq O 2/kg for fish oils intended for human consumption [ 28, 29]. Despite the increase of the PVs for studied oils after degumming step, final values obtained for the refined oils were below the limit of 5 meq O 2/kg ( Table 1) which opens the possibility of using these oils for human consumption.
